In England, in the seven days to 23 April, there were 13,946 new confirmed cases (24.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 16 April, there were 14,179 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 2% (233 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 28 April is 3,854,733 (6,848.4 cases per 100,000 population).
